name: Polarity Pulse
description:
Polarity Pulse is a game made in about a day for the ScoreSpace Jam #18 - The theme was "Magnetic", and the jam is mostly focused around leaderboards and highscores.
I joined in the last day so it's more of a demo, but I mostly wanted to try implementing leaderboards into a game. The leaderboard was implemented using LootLocker.
All code, sound and graphics were made by me.

With it's simple controls it's pretty mobile proof, and I plan to add some more features I didn't have enough time to add in the jam in the future.
